column6:
Full house available for your privacy

3 miles from the Alamo (downtown) and 1 mile from the AT&T center. The neighborhood is quiet and easy access to the freeway. 

-Please remember this is my home and i live here, please take care of the things as your own (No pets/smoking allowed :)

-I am not home a lot due to work, so I have security cameras outside of the house for my peace of mind
